movie_title: Is there a future without bees? 6 Minute English
introduction: Bee numbers are declining at an alarming rate and in some places disappearing altogether, which has

vocabulary.definition: a group of words established by usage as having a meaning not deducible from those of the individual words
vocabulary.example: English is full of idioms involving bees.

vocabulary.definition: the state or process of a species, family, or larger group being or becoming extinct
vocabulary.example: Up to half of all bee species are facing extinction in some European countries.

vocabulary.definition: to convey pollen to or deposit pollen on the stigma of a flower
vocabulary.example: Bees play a vital role in pollinating crops like apples and cucumbers.

vocabulary.definition: the process of causing a female animal or plant to produce seeds or offspring
vocabulary.example: Only after pollination can fertilisation occur in flowering plants.

vocabulary.definition: a person who introduces new methods, ideas, or products
vocabulary.example: Keren Mimran is an innovator in using drones for pollinating crops.

vocabulary.definition: the state of being free from danger or threat
vocabulary.example: Food security is a major concern related to declining bee populations.
